author: Mark Mann-Bryans; PA
title: Arsenal denied a return to Premier League summit as they are beaten by West Ham – The Irish News
text: Arsenal missed the chance to return to the top of the Premier League as they slipped to a disappointing defeat to West Ham amid more VAR controversy. The Gunners needed victory to replace Liverpool at the summit but lost 2-0 on a night where Hammers boss David Moyes finally landed a victory at the Emirates Stadium. West Ham lost Kurt Zouma ahead of the game and Lucas Paqueta after just over half an hour but hit the front through Tomas Soucek’s strike, awarded after VAR could not determine whether the whole ball had gone out of play in the build-up. A second-half header from former Arsenal defender Konstantinos Mavropanos secured the points and things could have been even better for the visitors had Said Benrahma not seen a last-gasp penalty saved by David Raya. A massive result for West Ham ⚒️ [#ARSWHU] [pic.twitter.com/JLAN9CInMV] — Premier League (@premierleague) [December 28, 2023] Moyes had failed to secure victory in his previous 72 Premier League away games at Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool or Manchester United, so this was a long time coming for the Scot. Arsenal laboured when they needed to continue their recent winning run in London derbies to go back to the top of the table. Instead, only captain Martin Odegaard could hold his head high on a night where their defence creaked and Gabriel Jesus was guilty of missing a couple of very good chances. Arsenal started well, with some great touches in and around the West Ham box from Odegaard in particular. But at the other end their defending left a lot to be desired, as Oleksandr Zinchenko and Gabriel Magalhaes failed to deal with a simple ball into the middle. Jarrod Bowen capitalised by latching onto the miscue and teed up Soucek to finish – the goal surviving a lengthy VAR check which could not ultimately make a call on if the ball had not gone out of play before Bowen’s cutback. Arsenal looked to respond although the goal gave West Ham something to defend, although Jesus found a way in behind with a subtle flick into Bukayo Saka, whose header was brilliantly saved by Alphonse Areola. Paqueta had been hurt in the warm-up and lasted just over half an hour, with his fellow Brazilian Gabriel Martinelli curling an effort just wide for Arsenal as they continued in vain to find a leveller. The hosts were getting closer, West Ham gifting possession as two passes saw Arsenal in on goal once more, this time Saka hitting the base of the post from an acute angle. Former West Ham captain Declan Rice fired just over from 25 yards but it was another player coming back to haunt his former club who would find the back of the net soon after. Mavropanos made just seven league starts in three years as an Arsenal player but returned to the Premier League last summer with the Hammers and headed them two goals ahead before the hour. Jesus then headed straight at Areola before sending another fine chance well over the bar moments after Arteta introduced Eddie Nketiah and Reiss Nelson off the bench. Areola was on hand again to keep out a Leandro Trossard effort, with Vladimir Coufal clearing a William Saliba header off the line from the resulting corner. Rice had come off the bench during a 3-0 Carabao Cup defeat on his return to West Ham earlier in the season and endured another night to forget here as he conceded a late penalty for tripping Emerson Palmieri in the box – only for Raya to keep out substitute Benrahma’s tame spot-kick.

author: Itzel Naranjo López
title: ¿Padre Adam Kotas y el Papa Francisco se llevaban mal? Hubo amenazas antes de ser expulsado de la iglesia católica
text:
El padre Adam Kotas recibió amenazas antes de su expulsión de la iglesia católica ¿Fueron de parte del Papa Francisco? Esto reveló el sacerdote.
Adam Kotas -de 39 años de edad- se volvió viral en TikTok por su singular forma de hablar de la iglesia, pues denunció a un sacerdote que lo había agredido sexualmente.
Esta situación provocó que la Arquidiócesis de Las Vegas y la Iglesia Católica amagaran con quitarle su sacerdocio, si no dejaba de hablar del tema.
Adam Kotas cuenta cómo fueron las amenazas de la iglesia católica y ¿del Papa Francisco?
El Papa Francisco -de 87 años de edad- removió el sacerdocio de Adam Kotas y por ende ya no puede ejercer somo padre en la iglesia católica.
Adam Kotas asegura que nadie le puede retirar el sacerdocio, pues este le fue designado por dios y no por la iglesia católica.
El padre Adam Kotas compartió un video en TikTok, para reiterar que la iglesia católica lo quiso callar y lo condicionaron.
Pues le propusieron que se retiraba en un monasterio o de lo contrario se le retiraría el sacerdocio.
“Me amenazaron, me dijeron: ‘Si tú no hace lo que nosotros te decimos, si no tomas el voto de silencio y te encierras de por vida en un monasterio te vamos a quitar el sacerdocio’ me amenazaron”
Adam Kotas
El sacerdote menciona que se encuentra deprimido, pero sus seguidores le dan ánimo para seguir adelante.
“Mi sacerdocio no viene de ellos, nadie, ni el Papa ni nadie me puede quitar el sacerdocio, nadie. Porque el sacerdocio es uno de los 3 sacramentos según la teología católica que nunca se borra, que deja una marca sobre el alma”
Adam Kotas
Adam Kotas asegura que sigue siendo sacerdote: “Nadie me puede quitar el sacerdocio, nadie” dijo muy seguro el padre.
Adam Kotas asegura que siempre será sacerdote aunque terminara en el infierno
Para Adam Kotas, seguirá siendo sacerdote hasta la muerte y aunque terminara en el infierno.
El padre acusa a la iglesia católica de quererlo intimidar para que desistiera de su denuncia y dejara las redes sociales.
“Querían llenarme de miedo y eso son armas del demonio, armas diabólicas”
Adam Kotas
Incluso, el padre Adam Kotas cuestionó por qué la iglesia no hace nada al respecto de los sacerdotes acusado de violación.
Pero sí lo reprendieron por denunciar y revelar las irregularidades de la iglesia católica.
“¿Por qué no hacen algo al respecto con los sacerdotes violadores pederastas ¿Tanto miedo les da el padre Adam Kotas? Porque digo la verdad y la verdad los incomoda”
Adam Kotas
Adam Kotas asegura que al revelar los abusos de la iglesia católica, busca proteger a su audiencia de aquellos padres que son pederastas.
El padre Adam Kotas asegura que él incomoda a la iglesia católica y en especial a los altos mandos de la Arquidiócesis de Las Vegas e incluso al propio Papa Francisco.

author: @jagrannews
title: Maharajganj Accident: तेज रफ्तार डीसीएम ने बाइक सवार को मारी टक्कर, हादसे में कुशीनगर के अधेड़ की मौत
text:
Maharajganj Accident: तेज रफ्तार डीसीएम ने बाइक सवार को मारी टक्कर, हादसे में कुशीनगर के अधेड़ की मौत
महराजगंज में राष्ट्रीय राजमार्ग 730 पर धर्मपुर चौराहे के पास एक तेज रफ्तार डीसीएम ने बाइक को टक्कर मार दी जिससे बाइक चालक पुजारी शर्मा की मौके पर ही मृत्यु हो गई। पुजारी शर्मा कुशीनगर जिले के रहने वाले थे। घटना सुबह करीब साढ़े पांच बजे हुई जब डीसीएम ने उनकी बाइक को टक्कर मार दी। पुलिस ने शव को कब्जे में लेकर परिजनों को सूचित कर दिया है।
जागरण संवाददाता, (भिटौली) महराजगंज। राष्ट्रीय राजमार्ग संख्या 730 पर गुरुवार सुबह धर्मपुर चौराहे पर तेज रफ्तार सब्जी लदी डीसीएम ने बाइक को जबरदस्त ठोकर मार दी। घटना में बाइक चालक की मृत्यु हो गई। मृतक की पहचान कुशीनगर जिले के नेबुआ नौरंगिया थाना के हरपुर मझार निवासी पुजारी शर्मा के रूप में हुई।
सुबह करीब साढ़े पांच बजे जैसे ही पुजारी शर्मा बाइक से धर्मपुर चौराहे पर पहुंचे। तभी गोरखपुर से आ रहे डीसीएम ने उनके बाइक को टक्कर मार दी और फरार हो गया। घटना में पुजारी शर्मा सड़क के किनारे जा गिरे। आनन-फानन में स्थानीय लोग उनकी मदद को पहुंचे। तब तक उनकी मृत्यु हो चुकी थी।
पुलिस ने मृतक के मोबाइल के जरिये अन्य फोन नंबरों पर संपर्क किया। इसके बाद मृतक की पहचान कुशीनगर जिले के नेबुआ नौरंगिया थाना के हरपुर मझार निवासी पुजारी शर्मा के रूप में हुई। थानाध्यक्ष भिटौली मदन मोहन मिश्र ने बताया कि मृतक के स्वजन को सूचना दे दी गई है। मामले में विधिक कार्रवाई की जा रही है।

author: Brian Dillon Newsweek Life
title: Woman at Airport Spots Her Doppelganger, Convinced 'Matrix is Glitching'
text:
Living
Woman at Airport Spots Her Doppelganger, Convinced ‘Matrix is Glitching’
One woman was surprised and amused when she saw someone who looked exactly like her while in the airport.
It's not often that we see a doppelgänger of ourselves out in the world. So when it does happen, it can often take us by surprise and make us wonder, what are the chances of this happening?
TikTok user, taytaybax23, or Tay Tay, had that exact experience when they were in an airport getting ready to board a flight. In a video posted to the social media site, which has received more than 300,000 views since it was first shared on January 20, we see a woman with a light blue shirt, bright pants, and straight jet-black hair that falls down just past the shoulders walking with her suitcase.
In the clip, the camera then turns to Tay Tay, who has the exact same hair and appears to be wearing the same outfit, apart from the shoes and the bag.
"Either she's my twin or the matrix is glitching at the airport," she wrote in the caption of the video.
As air travel soars to new highs, we pass by huge numbers of strangers while traveling through airports. According to Statista, over 38 million flights were taken last year around the world.
In the U.S., domestic travel also proves to be a busy industry, with over 819 million people having flown from one American airport to another in 2023.
Tay Tay's video received hundreds of comments from other TikTok users sharing their thoughts and reactions to the clip, as well as over 35,000 likes.
One user with the moniker blackarican85, shared: "I saw another doppelgänger video earlier! This is scary" along with a laughing face emoji.
Lucy Nioa commented: "The way I literally thought I was the doppelgänger, but realized I have not been anywhere near Melbourne. This is my exact travel outfit, bags and all."
"Omg this is the second doppelgänger video I've seen today. This is crazy," said Jade.
Kayla wrote: "This happened to me three times once. I couldn't stop geeking. 3 of us all sitting in a triangle. Exact same hair, glasses, jackets."
"This the 3rd doppelgänger video I've seen, I'm getting a bit uneasy at this point," said one user with the name T.
Mish shared: "it's such an uncomfortable experience for some reason. I respect her for maintaining such a close distance."
Has a dream vacation turned into a nightmare? Whether it's a missed flight or lost luggage, we want to hear about your travel disasters. Let us know via life@newsweek.com, and your story could be featured on Newsweek.
Related Articles
2025 NEWSWEEK DIGITAL LLC.
This story was originally published January 23, 2025 at 1:32 PM.

author: HispanTV
title: Unesco otorga Premio a Libertad de Prensa a periodistas en Gaza | HISPANTV
text:
La Unesco ha otorgado su Premio Mundial a la Libertad de Prensa a todos los periodistas palestinos que cubren la guerra genocida de Israel en la Franja de Gaza.
Mauricio Weibel, presidente del Jurado Internacional de profesionales de los medios de comunicación, anunció el premio durante una ceremonia en Santiago, la capital de Chile, el jueves, en vísperas del Día Mundial de la Libertad de Prensa.
“En estos tiempos de oscuridad y desesperanza, queremos transmitir un firme mensaje de solidaridad y reconocimiento a los periodistas palestinos que están cubriendo esta crisis en circunstancias tan dramáticas” , dijo.
Weibel destacó que como humanidad, tenemos una enorme deuda con su valentía y su compromiso con la libertad de expresión.
Por su parte, la directora general de la Organización de las Naciones Unidas para la Educación, la Ciencia y la Cultura (Unesco), Audrey Azoulay, dijo que el premio rinde homenaje al coraje de los periodistas que enfrentan circunstancias difíciles y peligrosas.
Amordazar la verdad: Israel ha asesinado al 10 % de reporteros de Gaza | HISPANTV El ejército israelí ha asesinado al 10 % de los periodistas de Gaza en un intento de callar las voces que informan al mundo de lo que está ocurriendo en la franja.
Israel desató una guerra genocida contra la Franja de Gaza, respaldado por Estados Unidos, el 7 de octubre después de sufrir un fracaso sin precedentes durante una operación sorpresa del Movimiento de Resistencia Islámica de Palestina (HAMAS), llevada a cabo contra la entidad ocupante en represalia por sus atrocidades intensificadas contra el pueblo palestino. Hasta ahora, el régimen de Tel Aviv ha matado a más de 34 600 palestinos, en su mayoría mujeres y niños.
HAMAS: matanza de periodistas por Israel es crimen de guerra deliberado En esta guerra, ha estado atacando deliberadamente a periodistas y sus familias en un intento por evitar que expongan los crímenes de guerra de Israel en Gaza. Casi 146 periodistas han sido asesinados en la guerra de Gaza.
Este viernes, HAMAS ha agradecido a los trabajadores de los medios y periodistas que transmiten la verdad sobre la ofensiva israelí y exponen las atrocidades contra los palestinos.
CPJ: Israel bate un récord histórico en matanza de periodistas en Gaza En una declaración con motivo del Día Mundial de la Libertad de Prensa, el grupo de Resistencia también advirtió que los crímenes israelíes contra periodistas no oscurecerán el terrorismo del régimen.
HAMAS ha denunciado que el régimen sionista está llevando a cabo una guerra agresiva contra periodistas, profesionales de los medios de comunicación palestinos, mediante ataques directos y deliberados, incluidos asesinatos, arrestos, persecuciones y restricciones, en flagrante violación de todas las normas y pactos internacionales.
“Exigimos a todas las instituciones de derechos humanos que criminalicen las violaciones y los crímenes de la ocupación contra los periodistas palestinos”, ha reclamado.
Organizaciones de DDHH señalan a Israel por asesinatos de periodistas ght/tmv

author: Sourtech
title: Instagram presenta herramientas inéditas para combatir casos de sextorsión - Forbes Argentina
text: [Meta](https://www.forbesargentina.com/tags/meta-t10280), matriz de Meta informó que Instagram comenzará en breve a probar funciones para proteger a los usuarios de la sextorsión financiera, término utilizado para referirse a una tendencia creciente de estafas de chantaje dirigidas con frecuencia a niños o adolescentes en las que los depredadores solicitan material sexual y luego extorsionan a la víctima para obtener dinero amenazándola con publicar o compartir el material online. Para hacer frente a este problema, así como al trillado fantasma de recibir desnudos no solicitados, Meta dijo que pronto pondrá en marcha un filtro de desnudos para los mensajes directos, o DM, en Instagram, un medio que reconoció que a veces es utilizado por la gente para compartir o pedir imágenes íntimas, estafadores incluidos. La función será capaz de detectar automáticamente las imágenes de desnudos que se envíen, difuminándolas y animando "a la gente a pensárselo dos veces antes de enviarlas", diciendo a los usuarios que "no se sientan presionados a responder", así como recordándoles que pueden anular el envío si cambian de opinión. El filtro, que los usuarios pueden elegir para eliminar y ver la imagen, también indicará a los usuarios recursos y consejos para enviar imágenes sensibles online, incluyendo el riesgo de que la gente las comparta o haga capturas de pantalla sin consentimiento y que la persona puede no ser quien dice ser. La función estará "activada por defecto" para los adolescentes menores de 18 años en todo el mundo, según Meta, y los adultos recibirán una notificación "animándolos a activarla". En el anuncio de Meta, Sameer Hinduja, codirector del centro de investigación sobre ciberacoso del Centro Berkman Klein de la Universidad de Harvard, dijo que la función abordaba la cuestión del contenido de desnudos online de una forma "reflexiva, matizada y apropiada", reduciendo la exposición a "imágenes potencialmente traumáticas" y educando a la gente sobre los posibles inconvenientes. ¿Significa que Instagram puede ver mis desnudos? Mientras que el análisis de imágenes como el filtro de desnudos de Meta requiere claramente el acceso a las imágenes, Meta dijo que el filtro de Instagram se ejecutará utilizando el aprendizaje automático -un tipo de [inteligencia artificial](https://www.forbesargentina.com/tags/inteligencia-artificial-t386)- en los dispositivos de los usuarios. Como tal, la compañía dijo que "no tendrá acceso a estas imágenes", con la única excepción de si los usuarios deciden denunciarlas. "Las empresas tienen la responsabilidad de garantizar la protección de los menores que utilizan sus plataformas, dijo John Shehan, Vicepresidente Senior del Centro Nacional para Menores Desaparecidos y Explotados, en el comunicado de prensa de la empresa. "Esperamos que estas nuevas medidas aumenten las denuncias de menores y frenen la circulación de la explotación infantil online". La policía de todo el mundo viene advirtiendo del aumento de las conductas depredadoras y la sextorsión dirigidas a niños, adolescentes y adultos jóvenes en las redes sociales. Los resultados de estos delitos pueden ser devastadores, incluso mortales, y cada vez son más los casos de jóvenes que pierden la vida a causa de tramas de sextorsión. El FBI advirtió recientemente del aumento de la sextorsión financiera por parte de desconocidos online, que suele tener como objetivo a varones adolescentes de entre 14 y 17 años. La agencia dijo que las víctimas "con frecuencia se sienten solas, avergonzadas y temerosas de buscar ayuda", añadiendo que "estuve un número alarmante de suicidios identificados en víctimas masculinas de esquemas de sextorsión financiera." El FBI dijo que es importante que las víctimas sepan que "no están solas" y que "pidan ayuda a un adulto de confianza" si se ven atacadas. *Con información de [Forbes US](https://www.forbes.com/sites/roberthart/2024/04/11/instagram-targets-teen-sextortion-scammers-with-nude-image-filter-for-direct-messages/?sh=51a9996c447b)

author: Amaris Encinas
title: What does 12/31/23 mean? The last day of 2023 is an angel number
text: NYE 2023 is on a unique date that occurs once every 100 years: Here's what 12/31/23 means. [Amaris Encinas](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5133245001/amaris-encinas/) The upcoming year will be filled with blessings, at least that is what the numerical sequence of this New Year’s Eve date suggests. If you take a closer look at the date, written as 12/31/23 or even 123123, you might see an angel number, which are [repeating number sequence](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/)s, often used as a guide for deeper spiritual exploration. The numerical sequences can range anywhere from [000](/story/life/2022/11/30/angel-number-000-meaning/10589434002/) to [999](/story/life/2023/01/30/angel-number-999-meaning/10806425002/), with each number having a distinct meaning and energy, USA Today previously [reported. ](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/) The once-in-a-century date, which won’t be seen again on our calenders until Dec. 31, 2123, marks a new beginning. One, that asks us to “transform and evolve with the times and in the right place to embrace what is coming to us,” [according to the Old Farmer’s Almanac website. ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) The date has also sparked an online trend, with TikTok users creating videos on the significance of the number and merchandise commemorating the date selling online, including on platforms like [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=123123&ref=cs_503_search), [eBay](https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p2332490.m570.l1313&_nkw=123123&_sacat=0) and [Etsy](https://www.etsy.com/market/123123?ref=seller_tag_bottom_image-1), the Detroit Free Press, part of the USA Today Network [reported.](/story/news/local/michigan/2023/12/27/angel-number-meaning-123123-last-day-year-numerology/72001298007/) Here’s what we know about the date. What does 12/31/23 signify within numerology? [Numerology is an ancient esoteric science](https://www.britannica.com/topic/numerology) that deals with numbers and letters and the energy, intention and vibration behind them, professional numerologist [Novalee Wilder](https://www.novaleewilder.com/) shared with USA Today earlier this month. "Before there was even language, there were numbers," she said. "Before we had named things, we had counted them, and we had assigned meaning to that count." The numbers that make up the angel number are just as important as the whole number, especially when you are trying to determine the vibration and intention behind the number. Professional astrologer [Narayana Montúfar](https://www.naramon.com/) told [ Farmer’s Almanac ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) that the “Number 1 brings the very spark of initiation, 2 focuses on building, and 3 is related to the concept of creation. Together, the sequence of these three numbers speaks of the spark of initiation that seeks to build a new creation.” If you add all the numbers that make up the date 123123 together, you will come up with 12. The number 12 in numerology can symbolize spiritual enlightenment, with potential for the day to deliver epiphanies and “aha” moments for individuals and society at large, the website stated. FYI: [How to keep your pets calm during New Year's Eve fireworks](/story/graphics/2023/12/28/keep-dog-calm-new-years-eve-fireworks/71999504007/) What are some dates to keep in mind in 2024? If you are an angel number enthusiast, there are a few key dates you might want to keep in mind as 2024 rapidly approaches. A palindrome, not unlike an angel number, is a term typically reserved for words or phrases that are spelled the same way backward as they are forward. Words like level, kayak, civic, and radar are among some of the most common palindromes, according to the [Old Farmer’s Almanac. ](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486) Numerical sequences seen in dates or times can also be palindromes, the most well-recognized ones being 3/20/23 or [11:11](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/1111-good-luck-and-history), the website stated. Here are all palindrome dates that will occur in 2024, courtesy of the [Farmer’s Almanac](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486): - 4/2/24 - 4/20/24 - 4/21/24 - 4/22/24 - 4/23/24 - 4/24/24 - 4/25/24 - 4/26/24 - 4/27/24 - 4/28/24 - 4/29/24 Contributing: Olivia Munson, USA Today 30 famous Capricorns you should know: [These celebrities belong to the winter Zodiac sign](/story/entertainment/celebrities/2023/11/29/famous-people-that-are-capricorns/71489302007/)

author: mdillard
title: Bestselling Author Karen Kingsbury Talks Faith, Hope and New Movie 'Someone Like You': "God Put This In My Heart!"
text: Comfort Bestselling Author Karen Kingsbury Talks Faith, Hope and New Movie ‘Someone Like You’: “God Put This in My Heart!” Woman's World's beautiful cover star opens up about her stress tips, joys and newest project! Many of author Karen Kingsbury ’s bestselling books have been turned into movies and television shows, and it’s a sure bet more will find their way on to a screen in the future, but Someone Like You , arriving in theaters April 2, will always hold a special place in the her heart. It marks a new chapter for the entrepreneurially-minded author as the first film from her own Karen Kingsbury Productions . “When you use your savings to pay for a movie and it’s a giant decision to do, but when you do, you end up with a decision making and that’s why we did it,” Karen tells Woman’s World sitting in the bright kitchen of her lovely Tennessee home during an exclusive interview for the cover of WW on sale now. “I feel like when I wrote the last page, I could hear God saying, ‘This is going to be your first movie,’ and I got chills.” https://www.instagram.com/someonelikeyoumovie/ is a beautiful love story with a lot of twists and turns as a young architect suffers heartbreaking loss, but finds love again in an unexpected way that sends emotional shock waves through two families. “When I write a book, God puts a movie in my heart and I can see it so clearly that honestly I don’t feel like I’m making it up,” Karen says. “I sit at my laptop and I’m laughing and crying. I always feel that I’m a stenographer. I get to see this movie and I get to capture it for you, so the most natural thing then is to want to see it on the screen.” All in the family Someone Like You was a family affair for Karen as her son Austin Robert Russell appears in the movie, whose cast includes Scott Reeves , Sarah Fisher , Jake Allyn and Lynn Collins . Karen’s son Tyler Russell co-wrote the screenplay with her and directed the film. “I often don’t even mention he’s my son because he just deserves his own name,” Karen says proudly. “Tyler and I have been writing scripts together and he studied directing in school. He’s done some other projects, not full theatrical features. This is his directorial debut for that, but I knew he was ready and he would grasp the material better than anyone.” MUST-READ: Karen Kingsbury’s Bestselling Book Series, ‘The Baxters’, Comes to Life in New TV Series Starring Roma Downey “The biggest challenge was getting it right,” Tyler says. “Working with my mom as the author was really helpful, but we kept tweaking that script just making sure that we were going from an 8 to a 10, making it a little bit better. We wanted to honor the story and honor the readers who loved the book so much. So that was a challenge, but it was one that we eventually nailed and I am so proud of where it landed.” A new, exciting venture In starting her own production company, Karen Kingsbury Productions, she says, was both excited and a little cautious. “Sometimes we have dreams that feel almost too big,” Karen admits to WW. “We don’t want to let go of them so maybe we keep them on some sort of list in our head, but the truth is we don’t really intend to get to it. Like if I said I was going to run a marathon, I’m not going to run it. It’s not going to happen, but when it came to this, I kept putting it aside because it was terrifying.” Karen continues, “We used all of our savings, and our financial people said, ‘Can’t you go and find an investor? Isn’t there another way?’ And there was another way, but any time if you use someone else’s money, they get decision making power and it just felt like, ‘Let’s really just do it!’” One of the advantages of being at the helm of the production was getting to cast the actors she wanted for the film, including Scott Reeves . “Scott and his wife Missy have been my friends for 10 years and we’ve always wanted to work together,” Karen says. “He loves my books. I was just thrilled to see how he brought such depth and emotion to this movie. It’s a different role for him because he’s so naturally boyish and handsome, but in Someone Like You he’s playing the grieving dad. I was just blown away!” Emotional moments in Someone Like You On the red carpet of the film’s Nashville premiere, Scott said playing Larry Quinn was an emotional experience for personal reasons. “The most challenging part for me was probably the fact that I have a daughter pretty much the same age — and if you’ve already seen the film you know what happens, but a lot of people haven’t yet,” he says, trying carefully not to reveal too much of the plot. “To go there in a real way was really hard, and for those of you who haven’t seen the movie, you’ll know what I mean after you’ve seen it. I’m an emotional guy anyway, and I have a rock-solid amazing relationship with my daughter. So to act that and to personalize that was probably the hardest thing for me to do as far as that story line goes.” His aching portrayal of a grieving parent wrestling with heartache is one of the best of the film, and he drew from his deep well as a loving dad to deliver that performance. “As a parent, you’re constantly worrying about them and you are praying for them,” Scott says. “You are just on your knees for them every day going, ‘Lord, just please watch over them, protect them and guide them.’ The worry never ends really for a parent.” Two-characters-in-one Sarah Fisher has dual roles in the film and admits that was part of what drew her to Someone Like You. “One of the things I was so excited about right off the top was being able to play two characters,” she says of playing London Quinn and her sister Andi. “It’s so exciting just to dive into one character and really figure out their quirks and who they are, but to be able to do that with two characters that Karen Kingsbury has written is such beyond an honor. There are not enough great words to describe it, but it was a really fun challenge for me. It was such detailed work and Tyler was so incredibly helpful as a director. He’s so amazing.” Sarah is also a fan of Karen’s writing. “I read Karen’s book Someone Like You and it was so amazing,” she smiles. “The characters are just so beautiful. The story is beautiful. I loved that it’s about love, but it’s also so focused on family. Karen has such a way of pouring her heart out onto the page. That’s why she’s Karen Kingsbury because everyone feels that. It’s so honest and authentic, and it’s so beautiful.” A premiere celebration for Someone Like You The Someone Like You premiere was held at the Franklin Theater in Franklin, TN, just south of Nashville where some of the film was shot. A Who’s Who of Hollywood and Nashville celebrities came out to celebrate with Karen and the cast, including Roma Downey , Amy Grant , Vince Gill , Danica McKellar , Danny Gokey , Matthew West , Rory Feek , Sam Palladio , Cassadee Pope , Shay Mooney of Dan + Shay, Michael W. Smith , his wife Debbie and their talented son Tyler , who composed the score for the film. MUST-READ: Country Music Icon Barbara Mandrell Talks God’s Plan, Her Retirement and ‘Precious Memories’ Digital Release (EXCLUSIVE) “Karen’s writing is phenomenal and I know as a producer how hard it is to get anything going so I’m here to celebrate her and all she has accomplished,” Roma Downey told WW on the red carpet. “I think this film, and all of her movies, TV shows and books, will touch people’s hearts and hopefully bring them closer to God.” Matthew West agrees. “People need the message of hope now more than ever,” he tells WW. “A lot of different types of content gets shoved down our throats, but the light shines brightest in the dark and when I think of Karen’s books and movies, I think of the word ‘light.’ So whether it’s music I’m putting out or books or movies that Karen’s putting out, to put out a positive message of hope in a world that is really desperate for hope right now, it’s not a surprise to me that that would resonate with the hearts of the people. We need to be uplifted now more than ever.” Shay Mooney , of the platinum selling country music duo Dan + Shay, was among the many celebrities walking the carpet who is a fan of Karen’s work. “I absolutely am a fan of Karen’s books,” he smiles. “My wife [Hannah ] introduced me for the first time…It’s just awesome to be here. Nashville always shows up for each other. It’s a very small community and it’s great to be an artist supporting an artist. Obviously, she writes books much more eloquently than I can write a song, but it’s awesome to see that art displayed in different ways.” https://www.womansworld.com/posts/entertainment/danica-mckellar-a-royal-date-for-christmas came out to support her friend even though she had already seen Someone Like You. “I love this film! I don’t watch a lot of dramas because I’m always afraid of being sad, but this movie makes you feel strong,” she says. “The acting is incredible. I’m so proud of Karen. She’s so talented and a good friend. This movie just encapsulates that strength that everyone wishes they could have and hopes that they will have if something terrible happens in their life. I hope as many people as possible get out to the theater to see it. You won’t regret it.” How to buy tickets to Someone Like You Opening on April 2nd nation wide, find tickets in a theater near you at SomeoneLikeYou.movie or Fathom Events.
